document.full_text: the country's top court refused to allow french citizenship for 10-year-old twin girls born to a surrogate mother in the united states who carried the babies for a french couple.
document.title: europe: france: surrogacy ban affirmed
lines_and_colors: the country's top court refused to allow french citizenship for 10-year-old twin girls born to a surrogate mother in the united states who carried the babies for a french couple.
